It's the long-awaited Oscars this weekend as well as The Independent Spirit Awards tonight and all the A-list celebs are out and about at varying parties and dinners in the build up. 
Kate Beckinsale was at one of the many events on Friday night, this particular one hosted by Piaget and The Weinstein Company. 
She looked her usual glamorous self in this stunning scarlet gown that cinched Kate in at the waist highlighting her tiny figure. The A-line skirt added serious glamour while the wide shoulders balanced out the look giving it an hourglass silhouette.
